refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: The open command opens the given BRL-CAD file. The command will look in the current working directory for the file. If the file is in another directory, use the relative or full path to the file or use the pwd and cd commands to navigate to the file's directory.

example.title: Open a BRL-CAD dateabase.
example.para: Opens example.g located in the current working directory.

example.title: Open a BRL-CAD database using the full path to the file.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
refsection.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to devs@brlcad.org
